stix:STIX_Header.stix:Title: Westgate Mall Kenya Themed Phishing Email Contains Malicious Embedded Link
stix:STIX_Header.stix:Description: On 27 September 2013, a Westgate Mall Kenya themed phishing email was observed. The email contained a malicious embedded link. If clicked, the target host is infected with the Extreme RAT. One C2 domain was observed during analysis.

stix:Indicator.indicator:Description:
----- BEGIN EMAIL HEADERS ----- Return-Path: <cnnnews_video@post.com> Subject: Official: Kenya mall attackers Video X-SENDER-IP: 72.2.115.27 X-SENDER-REPUTATION: -2.7 Received: from unknown (HELO 2e306df4-f974-4a30-9acc-e0031e07682a) ([72.2.115.27]) by with ESMTP/TLS/DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA; 27 Sep 2013 07:43:33 +0000 Received: from [211.24.24.74] (port=52729 helo=User) by 2e306df4-f974-4a30-9acc-e0031e07682a with esmtpa (Exim 4.80.1) (envelope-from <cnnnews_video@post.com>) id 1VPShs-0000mg-52; Fri, 27 Sep 2013 07:43:20 +0000 Reply-To: <g-fg@live.com> From: "CNN News"<cnnnews_video@post.com> Date: Fri, 27 Sep 2013 00:43:30 -0700 MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: text/html; charset="Windows-1251" Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit X-Priority: 3 X-MSMail-Priority: Normal X-Mailer: Microsoft Outlook Express 6.00.2600.0000 X-MimeOLE: Produced By Microsoft MimeOLE V6.00.2600.0000 X-AntiAbuse: This header was added to track abuse, please include it with any abuse report X-AntiAbuse: Primary Hostname - 2e306df4-f974-4a30-9acc-e0031e07682a X-AntiAbuse: Original Domain - X-AntiAbuse: Originator/Caller UID/GID - [47 12] / [47 12] X-AntiAbuse: Sender Address Domain - post.com X-Get-Message-Sender-Via: 2e306df4-f974-4a30-9acc-e0031e07682a: authenticated_id: loitaiai/only user confirmed/virtual account not confirmed ----- END EMAIL HEADERS -----
----- BEGIN EMAIL BODY ----- [LIVE] How the Terrorists Unfolded Attack at Westgate Mall Kenya and list of the victims! How Terrible!
Warning! Graphic images.
Click HERE to view & watch
Official: Kenya mall attackers refused to negotiate, 'only wanted to kill'
(CNN) ----- END EMAIL BODY -----
The embedded link included in the email body leads to the malicious URL, https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/[redacted]/Kenya%20terror%20Video.rar. Accessing this URL leads to the targeted host being infected with the Extreme RAT.

The following HTTP traffic over TCP port 8585 was observed during analysis:
GET /123456.functions HTTP/1.1 Accept: */ Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate User-Agent: Mozilla/4.0 (compatible; MSIE 7.0; Windows NT 5.1; Trident/4.0; default compatible; default version; default platform; DEFAULT USER-AGENT BEING USED) Host: imminentmoney7.no-ip.biz:8585 Connection: Keep-Alive
